name: HAND2HAND HOME OF GRACE

address: House No: 183/1, Flat No: 2, First floor, Behind Naveen Stationery,

briefDescription: Hand2Hand Home of Grace is a day care service with an emphasis on health & education for children, whose families cannot provide them with proper care right now as they are economically backward and are daily wage earners or domestic helps. These families, for a variety of reasons, have found themselves in desperate situations. The child cannot be sent to school as yet, fed properly since the parents earn meager salaries / wages. Hand2Hand Home of Grace is a day care home to children as we believe that a smaller family-like environment best enables children to overcome past difficulties and achieve their potential.
